org.primaresearch.io.xml

Interface SchemaModelParser

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FormatModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultSchemaParser

    public interface SchemaModelParser
extends FormatModel
    Interface for XML schema parsers that extract type and attribute information from schema files.
    Author:
    clc
